articles.title: Fabian Zetterlund scores 2 as Senators beat Bruins 6-2 for 4th straight win
articles.description:
David Pastrnak and Charlie McAvoy scored for the Bruins as Boston fell to Ottawa, 6-2.

The post Fabian Zetterlund scores 2 as Senators beat Bruins 6-2 for 4th straight win appeared first on Boston.com.
